Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Salisbury -YMCA of Hong Kong places you in the heart of Kowloon, steps from Hong Kong Cultural Centre and Nathan Road. This 4-star hotel is close to Harbour City and Avenue of Stars.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 372 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.
Make yourself at home in one of the 372 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at The Salisbury -YMCA of Hong Kong places you in the heart of Kowloon, steps from Hong Kong Cultural Centre and Nathan Road. This 4-star hotel is close to Harbour City and Avenue of Stars.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hong Kong Cultural Centre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
1881 Heritage - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Hong Kong Space Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Nathan Road - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Harbour City - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
ISQUARE - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Avenue of Stars - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Tsim Sha Tsui Clock Tower - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hong Kong Museum of Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Canton Road - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Tsim Sha Tsui Star Ferry Pier - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
K11 Shopping Mall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kowloon Mosque and Islamic Centre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ocean Terminal - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Hong Kong Heritage Discovery Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Salisbury -YMCA of Hong Kong is Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.) - 24.2 km / 15.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Rates are not valid during fair periods.please kindly be advised that our Indoor Swimmi Indoor Swimming Pools and The Jacuzzi will be closed from December 22 to December 26, 2018 (5 days) for yearly inspection and maintenance works. IMPORTANT To maintain vision of providing excellent hospitality services to valued guests, external façade renovation works will be carried out at The Salisbury – YMCA of Hong Kong. Start: March 2019 Completion date : October 2020 Renovation start/end time : 9 am to 5 pm, Mondays to Fridays (excluding public holidays, Saturday and Sunday) * View from Standard Room is blocked: 03-01 to 09-15-2019. * Noise from Demolition: 03-25 to 05-14, 08-17 to 10-01, 11-14 to 12-19-2019
